CustomField.formula: IMAGE("https://trustedshops--c.eu11.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0150Y0000026p36&oid=00D3L0000000dtj", "Target Market", 19, 19) + " " + target_market_link_generator__c + IF(ISPICKVAL(certificateType__c, "EXCELLENCE"), " (EXCELLENCE)", "") + IF(!ISPICKVAL(shopsoftware__c, ""), " " + IMAGE("https://trustedshops--c.eu11.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0150Y0000026p34&oid=00D3L0000000dtj", "Shop Software Provider", 19, 19), "")
CustomField.label: zz Target Market / Language
